Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite:::

Aelo, Celeno and Ocipite heards Darkfate's command and said:

Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite: come with us...

Aelo: We haven't anything to do here...

Celeno: You have some questions to us...

Ocipite: and we could give you some answers...

Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite: but not here... Will you follow us?


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Blaze looked back and forth between the three ladies. "OK, it's a 
start" she
> thought trying to remember what had happened.
> 
> "OK then you're saying that we're in a Predacon base? that would 
make us
> Predacons."
> 
> She heard Darkfate chime in as if on cue. That bot was giving 
orders which
> made it a command bot. "What's the chain of command around here?" 
She asked
> the three femms who'd just been talking to her, if she was to 
survive here
> she needed the scorecard.
> 
>
